raw_user_story: As a backend developer, I want to set up core DynamoDB entities (User, Organization, Repository) with proper table configuration so that I can build the foundation for the GitHub data model implementation
raw_criteria: DynamoDB table is created with correct GSI configuration
User entity supports CRUD operations with ACCOUNT#<username> keys
Organization entity supports CRUD operations with ACCOUNT#<orgname> keys
Repository entity supports CRUD operations with REPO#<owner>#<reponame> keys
All entities follow the single table design patterns from your ERD
raw_rules: Usernames and organization names must be unique
Repository names must be unique per owner
All keys follow the composite key patterns from your ERD
GSI1, GSI2, GSI3 indexes properly configured for access patterns

included: Jest test setup with DynamoDB Local
